text: == Events == * The revolt of Henry II, Duke of Bavaria against Otto II ends * England's royal mint is located at Guildford == Births == * Princess Zoe of Byzantium, later Empress of the Eastern Roman Empire * Yaroslav I the Wise, prince of Novgorod and Kiev == Deaths == * March 18 â€“ King Edward the Martyr of England * Abraham of Alexandria, Coptic pope * Li Houzhu, last Chinese emperor of the Southern Tang Category:970s
